headline: JURY HITS ADVERTISEMENT; Louisville Panel Backs Catholic Attack on Birth Control Copy

headline: Birth Control Held No Solution

headline: U.S. SECURITY SEEN IN BIRTH CONTROL; Planned Parenthood Is Called Key to Good Government by University President 'IGNORANCE' IS ASSAILED Dr. Valentine of Rochester Praises Federation -- Medical Profession Is Attacked
snippet: The key to good government and economic security that would give this country an "enduring national strength" is planned parenthood, the Birth Control Federation of America was told yesterday at its annual meeting in the Hotel Roosevelt.
